text:
Music is my other time-consuming passion. In my own time I love writing and recording music, performing at open mics, jamming with friends, or just putting on a good album.


I generally listen to a mix of indie rock, post-punk and folk. (here’s some albums I’m listening to right now)

gallery.caption: Iceage - Plowing into the Field of Love
Weyes Blood - And in the Darkness, Hearts Aglow

text:
Although I’m a software developer, I go outside sometimes. When I get the chance I like to do a bit of skiing, kayaking and hiking, especially in some of New Zealand’s most beautiful spots.


Here’s some photos from a recent trip to Abel Tasman National Park in NZ.

gallery.caption: Swimming in the pure blue waters
Having a beverage on the beach
Crossing the Awaroa Inlet during low tide
The most surreal landscape during night time

text: A little reel of some travels I've done recently.

gallery.caption: Having breakfast by the canal (Amsterdam, Netherlands)
Observing centuries-old monasteries built atop mountainous rocks (Meteora, Greece)
Rekindling my love for Game of Thrones after that last season (Dubrovnik, Croatia)
